report.moduleDisable: this module is disabled on this server.

jankenpon.description: Plays jankenpon and win or lose yens.
jankenpon.optionNotFound: you can only choose between `rock`, `paper` or `scissors`.
jankenpon.valueNotInputed: you didn't provide any value to bet.
jankenpon.youWin: you picked `{{0}}` and I picked `{{1}}`. Congratulations, you won. Here's your `{{2}}` yens.
jankenpon.youLose: you picked `{{0}}` and I picked `{{1}}`, I won! Charging you `{{2}}` yens, sweetheart

daily.congrats: Congratulations! You've received `{{0}}` yens today. You can get more yens tomorrow. See you later and have a nice day!
daily.hasBeenPicked: you've already claimed your daily yens today. Wait for `{{0}}` before claiming them again.
daily.description: You can get your daily yens by using this command

rize.decription: Rize will write something in the paper.

license.description: Are you licensed? No? Then create one for yourself! Or for someone else.

favcolor.invalidColor: the color you've chose is invalid.
favcolor.poorUser: you need more `{{0}}` yens to change your favorite color.
favcolor.successfullyChanged: sure. I successfully changed your favorite color.

profile.description: Shows your social profile or the social profile of someone.
profile.defaultAboutMe: "Chino is my friend!" You can change this using {{0}}aboutme

emojiinfo.description: Get some info about an emoji.

tippy.description: Make Tippy tell you a joke

fakemsg.description: Prank on someone with a fake message through webhook.

divorce.description: Divorces you to your current partner (I will charge 300 yens to divorce).
divorce.youAreNotMarried: you're not married, if you want marry, use `{{0}}marry <user>` and be happy.
divorce.youNeedToDivorce: you must have `{{0}}` more yens to divorce.
divorce.theyNeedToDivorce: your partner must have`{{0}}` more yens to divorce.
divorce.requestConfirm: are you sure you want divorce? This action is irreversible.
divorce.successfullyDivorced: Sure, I will call the lawyers. Both of you will pay `300` yens for it.
divorce.rejectedRequest: I think the oracle of love didn't let you separate. I'm glad you guys got along.

help.explain: If you want know more about a command, just use `{{0}}help [command]` and I will explain how use the command.
help.description: Show my command list to you.

rep.cannotGiveRepForYourself: you can't give reputation to yourself.
rep.forTheClient: thank you for giving me a rep point! Now I have `{{0}}` reputations
rep.successffully: you gave a reputation to {{0}}, now {{0}} have `{{1}}` reputations.
rep.cooldown: calm down! You can't give a reputation now. You must wait for `{{0}}` before giving reputation points again.

marry.youNeedToMarry: you need `{{0}}` more yens to marry.
marry.theyNeedToMarry: sorry, but {{0}} need more `{{1}}` yens to marry.
marry.youAlreadyMarried: what a shame! You can't marry someone else because you already are.
marry.theyAlreadyMarried: you can't marry with {{0}}, because {{0}} is already married.
marry.requestConfirm: {{0}}, do you agree to get married with {{1}}, in sickness and in health, in richness and in poorness until death do part you both?
marry.successfullyMarried: yay! Congratulations, now you both are married.
marry.rejectedRequest: what a pity. It seems that {{0}} doesn't want to share their life with you, maybe {{0}} isn't the love of their life. The oracle of love fails once more...
marry.cannotMarryWithYourself: imagine trying to marry yourself. I can't make it happen, sorry.
marry.cannotMarryWithMe: sorry little usagi. You can't marry with me. I'm sorry, but, I don't love you the same as you love me, I love you, but as, a friend.
marry.cannotMarryWithBot: you can't marry with a bot because they will never accept it.

invite.canAddMe:
You can invite me to your Discord server by clicking [here](https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={{0}}&scope=bot&permissions=2117578239).
Don't forget to vote me by clicking [here](https://top.gg/bot/481282441294905344/vote)

Do you need help? Join my support server by clicking [here](https://discord.gg/Jr57UrsXeC). Thank you and see you later.
